role.argrole: thing less inclusive than Arg0 (usually marked by من )

example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اكد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (PUNC ") (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_ACC تأثيرات) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_DU_GEN عقدين)) (PP (PREP من) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN انقطاع) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الادارة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN العامة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN اللبنانية)) (PP-CLR (PREP عن) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN مواكبة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN العصر))))))))) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART ما)) (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS زال) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-PRD (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC عقبة)) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN وجه) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN تغيير)) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (PP-PRD (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المفترض))) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S يكون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC تدريجيا)) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN احوال) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN عادية))))) (CONJ و) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اصبح) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN حال) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا)))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJP (ADJ_COMP+CASE_DEF_ACC اكبر) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN قدرة) (NP (DET+NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_GEN البعض))) (PP (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التأقلم)))))) (CONJ و) (ADJP (ADJ+CASE_DEF_ACC اشمل))))))))))))))
